Posted By: niceguygreensboro (3/21/2012 1:49:00 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
These pacts always feel a little iffy to me, but my crowd enjoys ocasional LD, so losing cause you can't pay is a real drawback. Even a well timed Gigadrowse (Untap step) could mess up your whole plan. Id be sure to be holding some spirit or simian guides just in case, for all pacts. Yeah, i'm not paranoid.
  
EDIT @Neverendingdream: Well thats certianly changes things. I was honestly not aware of that for over 10 years. I don't know weather to feel embarassed or happy to know that. On one side, I'm walking away from this with knowledge I didn't have before. On the other side, I'VE BEEN DOING IT WRONG FOR OVER 10 YEARS AND NO ONE ELSE BOTHERED TO POINT THAT OUT TO ME!! Sigh... thanks for the heads up.
posts.html:
